item.title: EP 178 - Does Bigfoot Come From Another Dimension?
item.itunes:title: Does Bigfoot Come From Another Dimension?
item.description:
Today we watch our backs!

First off, we patrol the world’s waterways on the hunt for a serial killer that may not even exist!

And then we head off to the forest to go on the hunt for  a Bigfoot that may find us first!

 

MERCH STORE!!!

https://www.redbubble.com/people/deadrabbitradio/works/35749420-dead-rabbit-radio?asc=u

 

Help Promote Dead Rabbit!

Dual Flyer

https://i.imgur.com/OhuoI2v.jpg

"As Above" Flyer 

https://i.imgur.com/yobMtUp.jpg

 

Discord: https://discordapp.com/invite/yxrXbXT

 

Fan Art By Nine

https://imgur.com/kmSr9Wy

 

Smiley face murder theory

https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Smiley_face_murder_theory

 

Manchester Pusher: Does a serial killer haunt the city's canals?

https://www.bbc.com/news/uk-england-manchester-45173888

 

Manchester's KILLER canals: Fears of 'serial slayer' as 61 people die in city waterways

https://www.dailystar.co.uk/news/latest-news/419484/Sixty-one-people-have-died-mysteriously-in-Manchester-s-waterways

 

Is a Serial-Killer Gang Murdering Young Men Across the U.S.?

https://www.thedailybeast.com/is-a-serial-killer-gang-murdering-young-men-across-the-us

 

Drowning the Smiley Face Murder Theory

 

http://homicidecenter.org/wp-content/uploads/2012/03/Research-Brief-on-Smiley-Face-Murder-Theory-FINAL.pdf

 

Vanishing Bigfoot and Anecdotal Accounts: Implications and Challenges for Researchers

http://sunstar-solutions.com/BFvanishing.htm

 

 

Listen to the daily podcast anywhere you listen to podcasts!

 

------------------------------------------------

 

Logo Art By Ash Black

 

"As Above" Art By Grant Scott

 

Opening Song: "Atlantis Attacks"

Closing Song: "Bella Royale"

Music By Dr. Huxxxtable

Rabbitron 3000 created by Eerbud

 

http://www.DeadRabbit.com

Email: DeadRabbitRadio@gmail.com

Twitter: @JasonOCarpenter

Facebook: www.Facebook.com/DeadRabbitRadio

 

Paranormal, Conspiracy, and True Crime news as it happens! Jason Carpenter breaks the stories they'll be talking about tomorrow, assuming the world doesn't end today.

 

All Contents Of This Podcast Copyright Jason Carpenter 2018
